r.d: PHP5 Object-oriented interface to the session_* family functions it provides extra features such as database storage for session data using DB package. Supported containers are PEAR::DB and PEAR::MDB2. It introduces new methods like isNew(), useCookies(), setExpire(), setIdle(), isExpired(), isIdled() and others.
r.n: - smaller fixes in phpcs (file names, etc.) - small fixes in MDB2 container - added more documentation inline - changed license to The BSD License
